Property.name: bypass
Property.description: Forces in port messages to be sent directly to out port, bypassing the timestamping functionality.

Property.name: time_correction
Property.description: Q32.32 time correction value which is subtracted from the applied time (note Qm.n implies existence of a sign bit).

Property.name: correction_overflow_sticky
Property.description: Sticky bit overflow indication of correction calculation.

Property.name: clr_correction_overflow_sticky
Property.description: Writing a value of true clears correction_overflow_sticky.

Property.name: force_error_on_invalid_time_at_start
Property.description: Forces worker into the unusable state if the time invalid signal is low during the worker initialized state.
